HandlePool::Handle HandlePool::handleFromId ( uint32  id  ) 

This method returns a handle given an arbitrary 32 bit id.

If accessed, the handles used_ is set to true.

Parameters:
id some arbitrary 32 bit id (perhaps a pointer...?)
Returns:
Handle a handle that can be used for occlusion querying.
